localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

nodes.excerpt: Cryptgeon is a fast, secure, open source self-destructing note sharing service. Inspired by PrivNote, Powered by rust & svelte.
nodes.title: Cryptgeon - Securely share self-destructing notes
nodes.author: Bharadwaj Giridhar

nodes.excerpt: The world's first eco-friendly electric flosser that flawlessly & painlessly cleans your teeth in 60 seconds. 12,000 sonic vibrations/minute w/ fully compostable floss heads make flossing as quick & easy as brushing your teeth. Stop flossing. Start FlaÃ¼sing.ğŸ¦·

nodes.excerpt: Focusplan is a powerful, full-featured, and flexible mind mapping and brainstorming app. It helps you capture your ideas, turning them into a stunning mind map. The iOS version is in development, signup to stay informed: https://www.focusplan.app/newsletter
nodes.title: Focusplan 1.6 - Mind mapping and brainstorming made easy

nodes.excerpt: Make way for the new generation. Cowboy 4 dropped in two frame geometries. With a new integrated cockpit to give your phone center stage, the C4 retains the iconic Cowboy frame while the C4 ST introduces our first ever step-through model.
nodes.title: Cowboy 4 - A sleek e-bike with a new integrated cockpit
nodes.author: Eduardo M

nodes.excerpt: Skribbl is a growing collection of free, hand-drawn illustrations brought to you by a global community of aspiring creatives. You can use our free illustrations for any purpose, without attribution. Enjoy!
